summary: Open source readiness: 3/10 items done, 7 community files remaining, plus hook bugfix

results.description: Fixed telemetry default in .twining/config.yml (enabled: true → false)
Fixed stop hook false positive: grep pattern now uses '"name":"Edit","input"' to match actual tool_use JSON structure instead of bare '"Edit"' which matched subagent output and planning text
results.notes: Copied fix to all installed locations. Requires new session to take effect.

results.description: Create 7 community files: CONTRIBUTING.md, SECURITY.md, CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md, .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml, .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.yml, .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml, .github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md
results.notes: Directory .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ already created. No files written yet. Use plan from transcript 75650ecc for content specs: dave@daveangulo.com for CoC contact, Contributor Covenant v2.1, 48h ack / 14d resolution for security, plugin version bump rule in CONTRIBUTING.md and PR template.

results.description: Verify build and tests pass after all changes
results.notes: Run npm test && npm run build to confirm

summaries: Decision: Use blackboard pattern for agent coordination instead of pipeline/message-passing
Decision: All state stored as .jsonl and .json files in .twining/ directory — no external databases
Decision: Embeddings must be lazy-loaded and fall back gracefully to keyword search if ONNX/transformers fails
Decision: Use ULIDs for all entity IDs — temporally sortable, globally unique
Decision: Decisions track commit hashes to link architectural choices to git history
Warning: PostHog API key exposed in git history — needs rotation
Warning: Potential conflict: new decision may conflict with 1 existing decision(s)
Warning: Potential conflict: new decision may conflict with 1 existing decision(s)
Finding: v1.0 milestone complete — all 3 phases shipped (storage+engine, embeddings+context, graph+lifecycle)
Finding: v1.1 milestone in progress — commit hash linking implemented (phase 4), further phases TBD
Finding: 22 MCP tools exposed: 4 blackboard, 4 decision, 3 context, 4 graph, 4 lifecycle, plus twining_commits
